text: The 2015 Campeonato Brasiliense de Futebol was the 40th edition of the Distrito Federal's top professional football league. The competition began on 25 January and ended on 2 May. Gama won the championship for the 11th time.Com um a menos, Gama vence o Brasília e conquista o título candango Globo Esporte, 2 May 2015 ==First stage== ==Final stage== ==Finals== Gama won 4–0 on aggregate. == References == Distrito Federal Category:Campeonato Brasiliense
title: 2015 Campeonato Brasiliense
